duties_responsibilities.duty: Utilize HTML and CSS to replicate Microsoft Word documents on the SmartSimple platform.
Design and maintain webpage templates following CPO style guidelines.
Stay updated with the latest SmartSimple functionality and logic syntax through training.
Formulate and implement a comprehensive plan for maintaining and updating contracts across various instances of SmartSimple.
Collaborate with Subject Matter Experts (SMEs) and Business Analysts to create new contracts and optimize the functionality of the SmartSimple platform.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (Master's preferred)
